commonBlocks.text:
At Stephendale Yard, the 7 modern warehouse-style offices have retained touches of their heritage, with original features such as sandblasted walls and original cast-iron windows.

The airy units sit around an attractive communal courtyard that has parking spaces for cars and bikes.

History

This former joiners’ workshop and metal-workers was built in the 1920s by our forebears, WJ Marston & Son, who, as local building contractors, used the site as their head office. We have retained some of the character of the building including sandblasted walls and original cast iron windows in places.

Amenities

Wandsworth Bridge Road has plenty of restaurants as well as coffee shops. There is also a large Sainsburys 5 minutes walk away on Townmead Road. The Harbour Club is within 10 minutes walk.

All the units at Stephendale Yard are self contained and open plan. They have their own gas boiler, WCs and tea making areas.

Main bus routes 295 and 28 are nearby on Wandsworth Bridge Road running towards Fulham Broadway and Clapham Junction and Wandsworth Town respectively. The C3 bus offers direct access to Clapham Junction and Earls Court via Chelsea Harbour. The new Imperial Wharf overground station is less than 10 minutes walk away and provides a direct link to Clapham Junction, West Brompton and Shepherds Bush. The nearest tube is Fulham Broadway which is a 20 minute walk or a 5 minute bus ride.

Bike racks are available on site.

Nearest Mainline Stations — Imperial Wharf and Wandsworth Town Rail

Nearest Underground Stations — Fulham Broadway and Parsons Green

Nearest Bus Routes — C3, 295 and 28
